levels.description: Attack range <@ba.vup>expands</>, Attack Interval <@ba.vdown>increases</>, attacks change to whirlwinds travelling forward, dealing damage proportional to the distance traveled (damage increase caps at 3 tiles); whirlwinds hit the closest target and <$ba.levitate>Levitate</> it for <@ba.vup>{attack@levitate}</> seconds, dealing a maximum of <@ba.vup>{attack@max_atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage
